title: Four Dead, Including Three Children, in Bronx Fire, Officials Say
description: Two other people who were in the home were taken to the hospital. One of them was in critical condition, an official said.
dc:creator: April Rubin and Nancy Wartik
media:credit: Dave Sanders for The New York Times
media:description: Four people, including three children, died after a fire broke out at a Bronx home on Sunday morning, officials said.
